name: Moonlight Mishaps
description:
NOTE: When you start the game, you need to click the screen once. Don't ask why. Just do it once, and then play like nothing happened~

Use the X key to drop the deer onto the platform.

Click the arrows to make them disappear.

If an arrow hits the deer pile or if the deer aren't dropped on the platform, then you fail the game.

You have to stack enough deer to the height of the moon to win.
